info.author: Cem YILDIZ
info.description:
============================
Turkish Suffix Library 0.1.3
============================

Turkish Suffix Library is a Turkish Suffix generator which changes nouns into ablative, 
genetice, locative, dative, acusative cases and possessive affix.

Installation:

pip: 
pip install django-turkish-suffix-library

manuel:
python setup.py install

Quick start
-----------

Add "tr_sufix" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this::

      INSTALLED_APPS = (
          ...
          'tr_suffix',
      )


Usage for templates
-------------------
      {% load trsuffix %}

Locative, ablative, genitive, dative and accusative cases are using like this, if the noun is a proper noun, the False paremeter should be set into True:

      {{ "araç"|tr_locative:False }}
      {{ "araç"|tr_ablative:False }}
      {{ "araç"|tr_genitive:False }}
      {{ "araç"|tr_dative:False }}
      {{ "araç"|tr_accusative:False }}

For possesive affixes, the first boolean parameter is for if it is proper noun or not. 
Second paremeter is the person and third parameter is if it is singular or plural means:

1,1: I
2,1: You (singular)
3,1: He/she/it
1,2: We
2,2: You (plural)
3,2: They

      {{ "araç"|tr_possessiveaffix:"False,1,1" }}
      {{ "araç"|tr_possessiveaffix:"False,2,1" }}
      {{ "araç"|tr_possessiveaffix:"False,3,1" }}
      {{ "araç"|tr_possessiveaffix:"False,1,2" }}
      {{ "araç"|tr_possessiveaffix:"False,2,2" }}
      {{ "araç"|tr_possessiveaffix:"False,3,2" }}

Usage on views:
---------------

Don't forget to put utf8 on top of the view:

      #-*- coding: utf-8 -*-

      from tr_suffix import stem

      print stem.suffix(u"araç"").makeLocative({"proper_noun": False})
      print stem.suffix(u"araç"").makeAblative({"proper_noun": False})
      print stem.suffix(u"araç"").makeGenitive({"proper_noun": False})
      print stem.suffix(u"araç"").makeDative({"proper_noun": False})
      print stem.suffix(u"araç"").makeAccusative({"proper_noun": False})
info.name: turkish-suffix-library
info.summary: Turkish Suffix Library is a function for you to make suffixes according the Turkish grammatic rulues.
